title: Zrće
text:
Zrće (, ) is a long pebble beach on the <a href="Adriatic%20Sea">Adriatic</a> island of <a href="Pag%20%28island%29">Pag</a> and is located on the Dalmatian coast. Zrće is located near the town of <a href="Novalja">Novalja</a> and the area of <a href="Gajac">Gajac</a>, about from the town's center. It is one of over 100 <a href="Blue%20Flag%20beach">Blue Flag beach</a>es in <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>, having received the award back in 2003.
Zrće beach is a Croatian summer destination for partygoers, with many <a href="discotheque">discotheque</a>s and beach bars operating during summer months. It regularly features <a href="house%20music">house</a>, <a href="Electronic%20dance%20music">EDM</a>, <a href="hardstyle">hardstyle</a>, <a href="r%27n%27b">r'n'b</a>, <a href="Hip%20hop%20music">hip-hop</a> and <a href="trance%20music">trance</a> <a href="disc%20jockey">DJs</a> at the peak of the Croatian summer season. Zrće Beach are home to clubs as: Aquarius, Kalypso, Papaya, and Noa Beach club. Activities include bungee jumping, jet-ski, party boats and inflatable catapults.
